Key.Name: new name for edit
Key.Payload: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer

Key.Name: Pulp Fiction
Key.Description: four tales of violence and redemption
Key.Payload: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits

Key.Name: The Prestige
Key.Payload: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion

Key.Name: Citizen Kane
Key.Payload: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance
